DellManagerNetworkProtocol.description: Oem data related to the ManagerNetworkProtocol Instance.
DellManagerNetworkProtocol.longDescription: Oem data related to the ManagerNetworkProtocol Instance.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PNAC.longDescription: This property defines Port-based Network Access Control.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AuthenticationServerCertificateValidatio.longDescription: This property defines validation status of Authentication Server Certificate. The default value is Disabled. To Enable this property the ServerCACertificates must contain a valid certificate.

ClientCSC.description: Defines the location of Client CSC Certificates uploaded.
ClientCSC.longDescription: This property defines the location of Client CSC Certificates uploaded.

ClientCertificateType.description: The type of client certificate the BMC will use.
ClientCertificateType.longDescription: This property defines the type of client certificate the BMC will use.

ClientCertificates.description: Defines the location of Client Certificates uploaded.
ClientCertificates.longDescription: This property defines the location of the Client Certificates uploaded.

InitialDeviceIDCertificate.description: Defines the location of Factory Identity Certificate.
InitialDeviceIDCertificate.longDescription: This property defines the location of Factory Identity Certificate.

Protocol.description: Networking protocol for Port-based Network Access Control.
Protocol.longDescription: This property defines the networking protocol for Port-based Network Access Control.

ServerCACertificates.description: Defines the location of Server CA Certificates uploaded.
ServerCACertificates.longDescription: This property defines the location of Server CA Certificates uploaded. AuthenticationServerCertificateValidationStatus property value should be set to Enabled to use the Certificate at ServerCACertificates.

ServiceStatus.description: Port-based Network Access Control service status.
ServiceStatus.longDescription: This property defines Port-based Network Access Control service status. The default value is Enabled.

title: #DellManagerNetworkProtocol.v1_0_0
